name: Unstable Mechanical Warframe
description:
In this game, you are a commander of unstable machines. Some of them have unstable states, some of them are very stable. In addition, your enemy also controls towers with unstable states. Some of the states will help you, but some of the states will crash your machine. Lead your army to destroy the core of your enemy!

The machines and towers will switch states randomly. The difference between unstable and stable is the possibility of switch states and the diversity of states.

I designed 10 preset levels, also I have developed a tiny level editor to allow you to create your own level!

This is my first time involved in Ludum Dare. The development is a little bit rush because I m a high school student and I need to go to school on Monday and I need to do all the game art and programming.

- In Battle Mode:

-- Use mouse button left to create minion on attack area(the blue block), create minion will cost your mech gene.

-- Use the mouse button right to create a flag, the minion will move to the flag point; if you want to delete it click the right button again.

-- Your mission is to destroy the core, when you destroy the core, you will move to the next level.

-- Use WASD to move your camera.

-- Use ESC to quit the game level, and use "R" to restart a room.

- In Editor Mode:

-- You can design your own level in this mode!
